item.description:
Where : Arrive at Wedeln Ski and Outdoors Club after 7:00 PM
or meet us at 6:30 pm ( before heading to Cranmore Fitness Center climbing wall on Friday night).

Guest Fees are $20 pp per night.

Who should come: Beginner and Expert Ice climbers/Skiers/Snowboarders

For climbers : Click the link below to find out more!

• http://www.ime-usa.co...
• Festival includes gear demos, clinics/courses and ...

Friday night ($10 Tickets at door)- A slideshow and indoor competition on Friday evening, 7:00-10:00 pm in the Cranmore Fitness Center climbing wall.

Saturday night ($5 Cover at door ) - Retro Knuckle-Bash dance party, Black Mountain ski resort in Jackson at 7:00 PM. There will be FREE FOOD from the Moat!


For skiers/snowboarders: Ski at

• Cranmore (5 minutes drive )
• Attitash or Wildcat or Black (20 minutes drive)
• Bretton Woods (45 minutes drive)
• Sunday River (1 hour drive )
item.how_to_find_us: Just come in - You will find all the Wedelns!
item.name: ICE FESTIVAL 2009 - See You On The LIFT/ICE Weekend!
